cab.content: Military Secret.634IdFrom Viceroy, Army Department, 27th June 1917. (Received 10 a.m., 28th.) 9521. Mahsud operations. On 25th force returned from Narai Raghzato Ispana Raghza. Opposition negligible, our only casualty being onesepoy wounded. Health of troops continues satisfactory. Report receivedfrom Dr. Lankester, O.M.S., deputed on independent inspection of medicalarrangements, shows conditions and accommodation are satisfactory.v.
